contexts.context: ...be paid, as hereafter stated, to the <mark>owner</mark>, for the improper detention of his Vessel....
..., which the mixed Commission may award to the <mark>owners</mark> for an unjustifiable Detention.
...same moment to award such pecuniary compensation to the <mark>owners</mark> for such detentions as appears to them reasonable....
...it hardly ever seems to occur to its remorseless <mark>owners</mark>, that is consists of sentient Beings.
